content: Yes, the introduction of new Pokémon is always an exciting time for fans of the franchise. Every new generation of Pokémon brings unique creatures, each with their own abilities, strengths, and weaknesses. This helps to keep the franchise fresh, as players can discover new Pokémon and find new strategies for battles. Additionally, the introduction of new Pokémon can also lead to new storylines and character development, as we've seen in previous games and anime seasons. It will be interesting to see what new creatures and adventures lie ahead for the franchise in the future.
